content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 3.5, 0.5)
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 0.5)

### Stone furnace at position(4.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, -62.0)

### Lab at position(unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position unknown)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have all required sub-ingredients available in your inventory before attempting to craft an item. In this case, iron-plates are needed to craft iron-gear-wheels, which are required for crafting steam engines.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that the second argument in the insert_item function is an Entity or EntityGroup, not a Position. Verify that you are passing the correct entity reference when attempting to insert items into a furnace or any other entity.
